user_question: Can you tell me the history of the game 'Myst' and generate an image of a mysterious island?
final_answer: Myst was released in 1993 by Cyan, Inc. It is a graphic adventure puzzle game that became the best-selling PC game until The Sims surpassed it in 2002. Image of a mysterious island generated. Myst was unique for its immersive first-person perspective, lack of inventory, and emphasis on exploration and puzzle-solving without explicit goals.
